snippet: The administration is delaying enforcement of the health law provision that prohibits employers from providing better benefits to top executives than to other employees.
abstract: Obama administration is delaying enforcement of health care law provision that prohibits employers from providing better health benefits to top executives than to other employees.
lead_paragraph: The administration is delaying enforcement of the health law provision that prohibits employers from providing better benefits to top executives than to other employees.

headline.main: Rules for Equal Coverage by Employers Remain Elusive Under Health Law
headline.print_headline: Rules for Equal Coverage by Employers Remain Elusive Under Health Law

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
